snippet.title: The Quizard's Domain - Tiny Teams 2024 - Yogscast Gameplay Stream With Dev in Chat
snippet.description:
Out of 1600+ submissions, The Quizard's Domain was selected to be part of the Tiny Teams Festival 2024, one of the biggest indie game events EVER!

This is THE WORLD'S FIRST live gameplay stream of the game, full session, with three lovely members of @yogscast battling it out to prove their brains AND brawn!   

▬▬▬▬▬

Original full stream:
The Pre warmup, warmup: Boba, Jennifer & Daf | Tiny Teams 2024 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wZus1pAHFyQ

Cast links:
@boba69  //   https://www.twitch.tv/boba   
Daf // https://www.twitch.tv/dafnotdaff

▬▬▬▬▬

Wishlist "The Quizard's Domain" on Steam today, and hang out with us on Discord to provide feedback and suggestions, as well as joining future closed testing!

Steam: store.steampowered.com/app/2802490/The_Quizards_Domain/
Discord: https://calmpewter.games/discord
Website: https://calmpewter.games/
Presskit: https://calmpewter.games/presskit/

▬▬▬▬▬

What's this all about?

Knowing is only half the battle! Pub quiz meets pub brawl in this fast-paced hero-based BATTLE QUIZ! Knock out friends and foes as you smash your way to the correct answers, in a wide variety of arenas and game modes. Trivia night just got way more intense!
